items: Automatic minutes at end of meeting

hero.tagline: Click "Online", issue a URL, share it, and you're in. When you hang up, minutes start generating automatically.

image.caption: Start a Zoom-like meeting from the "Online" button.

notes.foot: Try it on web or download the iOS app.
items: Duration limits and remaining time depend on your plan/quota
Network conditions and device settings may affect quality

release.p1: Minutes.AI now supports Online Meetings. It’s as simple as clicking "Online" to issue a URL and share it to start a Zoom-like call.
release.p2: When the meeting ends, minutes are generated automatically to clearly capture decisions and action items.

seo.description: Click "Online" to issue a URL, share it, and start a Zoom-like meeting instantly. Clean minutes are generated automatically when the meeting ends.

ld.description: Host Zoom-like meetings via an issued URL, then get automatic minutes with clear decisions and actions.
ld.headline: Minutes.AI adds Online Meetings

seo.ogDescription: Start Zoom-like meetings from the "Online" button and get automatic, well-formatted minutes at the end.
seo.title: Minutes.AI now supports Online Meetings (iOS)

items: Click "Online" in the app or web
steps.note: Meeting duration depends on your plan and remaining quota.
